helpInfo.BlackListPath: An array that contains files and or paths that are forbidden to access
helpInfo.MimeTypesCustom: An array that contains custom defined file mime types
helpInfo.Page403Custom: A string path that tells the server to use a custom 403 page, avoid a forward slash at char[0]
helpInfo.Page404Custom: A string path that tells the server to use a custom 403 page, avoid a forward slash at char[0]
helpInfo.certificates: Tells the server where the crt and key are located
helpInfo.hidePublicIp: Tells the server to hide the public IP addresses of clients for privacy reasons
helpInfo.ip: A string that tells the server where to bind, use 0.0.0.0 to bind to all interfaces
helpInfo.port: A number that tells the server what port to bind to, 80 is the standard for HTTP
helpInfo.useFileLogging: A boolean to tell the server to write to a log file on the disk or not
